title: Absolutely disguising service from such an established company for my pixel 4xl
content:
I am going in circles, google refuses to replace my phone under warranty. You try to call them and they email you, they ask for things and then dont reply, im without a phone for a week almost now.
I am so disappointed in how this is being handled, if i had an apple device it would have been replaced already.

no liquid damage
never dropped
just stopped working, not reading sims not connecting to wifi, did a factory reset, nothing and nobody is helping me this is crazy.
